text: Ane tamaro palanahara spasta rite adesa api cukayo che ke tame tene chodine an'yani bandagi na karaso ane mata-pita sathe sadavartana karajo jo tamari hajarimam temana manthi eka athava banne vrd'dhavasthamam pahonci jaya to temane â€œuphaâ€ pana na kaheso, na to temane thapako apaso, parantu temani sathe sabhyatathi vata karajo
